name: SMITE Adventure: Corrupted Arena
description:
The Mayan Pantheon has corrupted the Arena… And it’s more dangerous than ever.

Can you escape the wrath of Kukulkan and the collapsing Arena floor? Find out in SMITE’s newest Adventure: Corrupted Arena.

Bundle includes:
Dragon's Rage Kukulkan Skin
Corrupted Kukulkan Ward Skin
Corrupted Avatar
Corrupted Music Theme
1 Gold Key, to unlock a Limited Skin like Dragonkin Skadi
